title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Appoint Individuals to Key Administration Posts â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
March 26, 2020
Today, President Donald J. Trump announced his intent to appoint the following individuals to key positions in his Administration:Michael B. Stoker, of California, to be the Federal Representative on the Western Interstate Nuclear Board.Alexei Woltornist, of New Jersey, to be an Assistant Secretary of Homeland Security (Public Affairs).Michael A. Weiner, Ph.D., of California, to be a Member of the Board of Directors of the Presidio Trust for a term expiring May 4, 2023.
